website_summaries.verdict: Customers love the look and sound of this corner fireplace, although some found it to be smaller than they anticipated.
pros: A sturdy unit with an attractive white finish look
Fireplace holds one to three canisters at a time, which burn for up to three hours
cons: Only the front of this fireplace is white
the back is bare, which shouldn't be an issue if you have it in a corner
Can be flimsy if you have to move it around at all
On the small and expensive side

customer_reviews.title: Looks Inviting
customer_reviews.text: Looks inviting sitting in the corner of our living room. I don't like gas appliances (old fear from a kid experiencing gas leaks) and I'm at the age of not wanting to lug in firewood so this was a win, win. I put it together, had to ask them to send a new piece that had a malfunction but customer service was right on it and had the piece in several days. I'm 68 and not totally experienced at these kinds of things but it was actually a snap.
customer_reviews.author: Penny W.

customer_reviews.title: Grand fireplace.
customer_reviews.text: I love this fireplace. I was hesitant to order it because I thought it would look small and hoaky. But it's anything but. It looks very grand. It has a timer, which is nice. And a lot of space for decor on top. I was kinda disappointed that it's just the front and top of the mantle. The whole back is hollow. Still. It looks great.
customer_reviews.author: Katrina Rhoads

customer_reviews.title: we're going to keep it due to how beautiful it is
customer_reviews.text: The 3-star rating stems from a combination of 5-stars for the appearance and 2-3 stars for the heating capability of the fireplace. Our basement area is around 500 SF and this fireplace, rated at 4,300 BTU really doesn't heat the area at all. However, we're going to keep it due to how beautiful it is. I would not purchase again (due to heating capacity) but it's too pretty for me to go through the trouble of taking apart and returning. Took about 45 minutes to assemble...directions were straightforward and simple.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great Purchase
customer_reviews.text: WE just love this fireplace looks so real.It took hubby and I about 2 1/2 hrs to put together.I had a small electric stove before which I had for 7 years before a switch broke so I started looking around.I really like the wood around the fire fits in the corner perfectly.I also like you can set the temperature. We have had nothing but grey days a 2-4 inches of rain each day so nice at the end of a day to light the fire and just gaze into it.Looks like the real deal.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful and lovely Heater Furniture
customer_reviews.text: This is a great product and awesome quality. My wife and I loved it, we are very satisfied with our purchase. It takes no more than 90 minutes to build it, it is simple, tool is included, so you don't need anything else. It is well packed and protected, it contains 2 large boxes, I could transported it in the trunk of a SUV (Lincoln MKX) with no issues. Color matched with our actual furniture in the living room. We really suggest this product.
customer_reviews.author: Jose Espericueta

customer_reviews.title: Excellent for medium size room
customer_reviews.text: I was very pleased at how it was packaged and how it arrived it rocket time . The wood is actually pretty thick and heavy . I know some reviewers mentioned it would be nice if it had a backing but it is just fine to me . A little pricey but nice and not to small . Perfect accent to a room. The directions were nice and detailed. I had no trouble putting it together. Various lighting settings and ambience! It warms a medium size room very nicely . Very happy with it so far
customer_reviews.author: D.Bat

customer_reviews.title: There is nothing good about this item.
customer_reviews.text: This fireplace is a piece of garbage. DO NOT WASTE YOUR MONEY. There are no side panels, which causes the cabinet to sway. Everything is loose, and shifts and cracks when it's moved. Unable to return as tried to make alterations to make it stay together (which it still doesn't).
customer_reviews.author: Lonetta

customer_reviews.title: Gives off good amount of heat for a large size room or bedroom
customer_reviews.text: Produces nice heat for a smaller room. Stylish modern look sits it corner so it is a space saver. Fire box is good size and it is calming to look at.
customer_reviews.author: edward benner

customer_reviews.title: nice addition
customer_reviews.text: Item is a beautiful addition in our church foyer. It does not kick out much heat and is not very bright but it does add a nice ambience. Everyone in our church says it’s beautiful.
customer_reviews.author: Michael E. Thornsley

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: Flimsy and the materials were not made well. Parts were broken during assembly.
customer_reviews.author: Randel L. Averett

customer_reviews.title: Other remotes in house interact with fireplace
customer_reviews.text: Great product. Pretty good quality. Looks great on our brick. Only real complaint is the remote. Anytime I use the remote for our ductless heating, the fireplace goes nuts and starts changing random settings.Tturning heat up, down, or off. Ive had the tv remote interact with the fireplace as well.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nice
customer_reviews.text: Love it! The look of a fire without the nuisance of hauling wood.
customer_reviews.author: Jane M

customer_reviews.title: Amazing product and easy installation
customer_reviews.text: Really really great product for the money. Fireplace works great and the ease of assembly was also pretty awesome. Would highly recommend this product to anyone. Only gripe is white is prone to finger prints but easily cleanable.
customer_reviews.author: Kyle

customer_reviews.title: Great Piece!
customer_reviews.text: I placed this beautiful piece in the corner of my loft area. It really makes the space feel cozy. The wood finish matches perfectly with my decor too. I'm really happy with this purchase and may buy again for another room in my home.
customer_reviews.author: memory

customer_reviews.title: Great fireplace.
customer_reviews.text: It looks wonderful , it has added a great look to our room.
customer_reviews.author: K.P.

customer_reviews.title: I have recommended to our family and friends as the item was ...
customer_reviews.text: We bought the corner fireplace for our bedroom. I have recommended to our family and friends as the item was packaged well with zero damage, was easy to put together and looks wonderful in our room.
customer_reviews.author: Larry

customer_reviews.title: Nice
customer_reviews.text: So far so good. I bought it at the end of the heating season, as soon as the cold weather in Wisconsin hits in October I’ll be able to tell more. Fits perfectly in my small corner
customer_reviews.author: Tammy Krueger

customer_reviews.title: Fits perfect in the space I have and looks great
customer_reviews.text: Exactly what I was looking for! Fits perfect in the space I have and looks great, just in time for the holidays!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Realistic Fire settings- Decent looking unit
customer_reviews.text: I like it, don't over tighten the bits and enjoy!! Quality finish and the $$ is in the beautiful heating display- looks legit in several settings- this is actually electric!!
customer_reviews.author: ESF

customer_reviews.title: Next best thing to a gas fireplace.
customer_reviews.text: I really love my fireplace. Fits perfect in my apartment. It was a lot easier to assemble than I expected.
customer_reviews.author: Blanca J

customer_reviews.title: fascinating
customer_reviews.text: The fireplace is almost everything I wanted. The only think missing is the real sound of a fireplace and I have added a Woodwick candle on the mantle to get the desired effect. Do ASK for the assembly instructions. II held me back a week for the enjoyment of my fireplace. My cats LOVE to cuddle in front of it just like the Night Before Christmas!. Once I got the instructions,, even me, a no DIY gal, was able to put it together and I enjoyed doing so I recommend this for its ambiance and for the opportunity to put your Xmas garland and lights on the mantle after it is assembled. Enjoy! Dr. Carole M. Rowland.
customer_reviews.author: Dr. Carole

customer_reviews.title: Once assembled the mantle looked very nice. When the firebox arrived it only took five ...
customer_reviews.text: The fireplace and mantle came in two boxes but not at the same time (4 days apart) but that was ok. The mantle arrived first and took about 45 minutes to assemble, instructions were clear, each part clearly labeled, but be carefull this is vaneered fiberboard with inserts for the bolts, not all the inserts are flush and if you overtighten the bolts they will pull out and then you will need to use glue. Once assembled the mantle looked very nice. When the firebox arrived it only took five minutes to install, just 4 screws. Switched it on and it looks great, with the heat turned on it warms the room nicely. I am very happy with this purchase
customer_reviews.author: speearep

customer_reviews.title: Love this Fireplace
customer_reviews.text: This was a great purchase. It is exactly what we needed for our empty space. The quality is great and I works perfectly!
customer_reviews.author: Heather MacAlpine

customer_reviews.title: Easy to put together
customer_reviews.text: Arrived on time. Easy to put together. Fits perfectly. Looks good with fireplace on or off.
customer_reviews.author: Don Danner

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Excellent purchase! We love our fireplace, it looks beautiful in our home, cozy and warm.
customer_reviews.author: lissette

customer_reviews.title: it is perfect for small apartment or condos
customer_reviews.text: I Lowe it,it is perfect for small apartment or condos, and I got it in a week so that was nice
customer_reviews.author: maida  salkic

customer_reviews.title: mixed feelings about this one
customer_reviews.text: This fireplace is very lovely. It has multiple light and heat settings. It is very attractive!! However, it is also a bit too loud. For the price, I expect it to be quieter. Our other complaint is that the top is not a solid piece, but made of 3 pieces. However, it is cute and looks nice in our corner and I am keeping it, but it was expensive and I wish I could figure out how to quiet the sound a bit.
customer_reviews.author: cat49

customer_reviews.title: The product was delivered with a few defects (chip-offs). ...
customer_reviews.text: The product was delivered with a few defects (chip-offs). The delivery was during the Xmas holidays season and I didn't have time to exchange it. It's not the quality product I expected.
customer_reviews.author: Jacqueline

customer_reviews.title: pretty
customer_reviews.text: very pretty but does not work if it is colder than 30 outside. anything below that and it just doesn't heat up the area. constantly runs, does not shut off once room is warmed up. I have one in my den and it shut down once room reaches certain temp. and then kicks on again. this one does not do that. a little disappointed in how it functions. would not recommend this certain fireplace.
customer_reviews.author: shirley zawrotny

customer_reviews.title: ISNT ELECTRIC. - Beware!
customer_reviews.text: The advertisement states its an electric fireplace. Its NOT! You have to use these candles on steroids instead of electricity. Im not very happy with the deception.
customer_reviews.author: jason bolognini

customer_reviews.title: This Real Flame fireplace exceeded our expectations on quality and realism and adds a great touch to the room
customer_reviews.text: We recently purchased a home and have been slowly remodeling. We had to remove and old broken wood stove on a corner hearth and were debating what to do. Replacing it with a corner electric fireplace was a decision that we have not regretted making. This Real Flame fireplace exceeded our expectations on quality and realism and adds a great touch to the room! Attached are the before and after photos.
customer_reviews.author: Agape Lens

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful fireplace
customer_reviews.text: Love this. It is much nicer than I expected. Does not have that fake feel. It feels cozy, homey, elegant, and quite attractive. You can control all the features from a remote control. The "fire" light has different levels of brightness...dims from high to low. You can turn the fire glow on without actually turning on the heater. The heater works well. It is expensive compared to other, plainer, brown heater fireplaces I've seen online or in various stores, but it is so much nicer looking than those, that it is worth it.
customer_reviews.author: Lili

customer_reviews.title: Overall, a nice addition to the living room!
customer_reviews.text: Don't buy it for the realism (it's not at all realistic, nor is it meant to be, I believe) or the heat (it's not really powerful at all). But definitely do buy it for the incomparable presence and character it will add a room. The thing is massive, and really pretty and classy. Initially we meant to turn on the lights of it once in a while, but it feels so nice to be around, that we actually turn it on every evening in the end.
customer_reviews.author: Rudy Rigot

customer_reviews.title: Impulse
customer_reviews.text: This was an impulse purchase. We have a corner in our bedroom that was just really bare and after a brief thought, I purchased this. It is too short to see from the bed, although if you were in a large bedroom that might not be a problem. It does have a nice aesthetic to it, and fit perfectly into the corner. The remote is very handy although seldom used. It does put off quite a bit of heat and has a nice glow to it. I do wish that there was some sort of crackling fireplace noise that makes a fire so lovely.
customer_reviews.author: JBullock

customer_reviews.title: Must buy!
customer_reviews.text: This fireplace is absolutely gorgeous with all the features that are a must like programmable timing, different lighting settings, temperature control, and no heat/ambiance only option! Beyond happy with this purchase and would highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Brianna Vanderpool

customer_reviews.title: beautiful fireplace
customer_reviews.text: Came with the led flame insert. The flame makes quite a noticeable hum. One of the face pieces came with some marring but the manufacturer is sending new pieces. took about 20 minutes to build after unpacking.
customer_reviews.author: Kleinlt

customer_reviews.title: Cheap Quality
customer_reviews.text: I wasn't thrilled with the quality and expected a lot more for spending over $400. It's entirely particle board. I also had to use some caulk along the cracks. If you are going to invest in an electric fireplace, do some research and see if you can buy the heating unit alone and have a carpenter build you something more sturdy.
customer_reviews.author: Rays Fan

customer_reviews.title: Little noisy with the fan on
customer_reviews.text: Little noisy with the fan on, not the best quality of materials observed during installation, but once together it does look nice. I love the different flame features and timer. The wrong fireplace was delivered my Amazon prime, but the trouble was sorted out and the company made good and good us the fireplace we wanted.
customer_reviews.author: Lolly

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: I am very picky and looked for a long time for a white fireplace to put in a lake cabin. Love it!! Looks great and puts out quite a bit of heat!
customer_reviews.author: Angie C

customer_reviews.title: Easy to assemble. Perfect size for us
customer_reviews.text: Easy to assemble. Maybe 30 minutes. Perfect size for us. Mantle helpful for pictures etc.
customer_reviews.author: Pete P.

customer_reviews.title: I cannot recommend this item.
customer_reviews.text: Such effort; such a waste of time and money. I've wanted a faux fireplace for years and finally moved to a place with a perfect spot for one. The mantel is so poorly constructed, screws do NOT stay screwed in, even when a power screwdriver is used. I had to use glue and duct tape to keep screws in their holes. The firebox could only be attached on one side because the other side is bent. Because the screws are short and the wood crumbling, even glue doesn't hold them in place. I've seen far better quality at Ikea. Now I pray it holds together long enough for me to find something else.
customer_reviews.author: JJ

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful!! Disappointed in the color, way lighter. Definitely not expresso!
customer_reviews.author: Patrice Wells

customer_reviews.title: very easy to put together
customer_reviews.text: its growing on me. so cheap. first experience with this type of product. very easy to put together. like an easy "Sauder" kit. guess i expected more. this is not a solid piece of "furniture", it is merely a face. not very sturdy -some screws go in but pull right out -not useful Again...it's growing on me
customer_reviews.author: wende

customer_reviews.title: looks great
customer_reviews.text: it looks just as pictured. I got because of it's size and it didn't stick out from the wall very much. it's great for small areas, and it heats the room well. it's beautiful and we just love it.
customer_reviews.author: Tausha M.

customer_reviews.title: Would give it zero stars if i could
customer_reviews.text: first off i received the wrong fireplace. then, it took a while to get the right one only to have the unit arrive broken. then, after waiting forever.... to get the replacement i installed it in my bedroom only to be INCREDIBLY....... disappointed because the damn thing is soooooo loud that i swear the people downstairs can hear it. i can hear it all the way from my living room and all i want to do is scream because this thing isn't cheap. all that waiting and all that anticipation for nothing....................
customer_reviews.author: Virginia Perez

customer_reviews.title: Great Little Fireplace
customer_reviews.text: It looks great in our living room and even the log looks realistic! The only issue I have with it is that it's a little difficult to find gel fuel in the right size can, but with all three burning it creates quite a bit of heat with almost no odor! Putting it together was really easy and do yourself a favor and take the allen wrench and cut it to be able to put it into a drill. Saved a lot of time on piecing it together@!
customer_reviews.author: Off Road Commando

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great addition to my theatre room, when left on it fills the entire basement with warmth.
customer_reviews.author: DH

customer_reviews.title: Okay, but wouldn't buy again
customer_reviews.text: For the price, this fireplace does it's job. It's sturdy and looks nice. It's expensive to purchase and burn the flame canisters. Also, if you have floorboards, just be aware that the fireplace will stick out from the wall a little, which makes it look less real than it could.
customer_reviews.author: Island Mom

product_meta.title: Real Flame 5950E Chateau Corner Electric Fireplace, Small, White
product_meta.description: The Chateau corner electric fireplace features the clean lines and classic styling familiar to stone mantels, realized in wood. In three great finishes, this design is sure to compliment a variety of decor from classic to contemporary. The vividly electric firebox plugs into any standard Outlet for convenient set up. The features include remote control, programmable thermostat, timer function, brightness settings, and ultra bright vivid flame led technology. Available in Dark walnut, espresso, and White.
feature_bullets: Includes: mantel, firebox with screen Kit, and remote
1400 watt heater, rated over 4,700 BTUs per hour

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.4 out of 5 stars89 ratings4.4 out of 5 stars
